content:
@James Agnew, in FHIR the dateTime DataType can also be partial (e.g. just year or year + month) looking at the hapi code it seams partial dates are not supported. Is there a reason why and can you implement support for this?

Kind regards,

Gerrit

Gerrit Hageman said:

James Agnew, in FHIR the dateTime DataType can also be partial (e.g. just year or year + month) looking at the hapi code it seams partial dates are not supported. Is there a reason why and can you implement support for this?

Kind regards,

Gerrit

@James Agnew do you have any feedback on this?
